On Tue, 8 May 2001 nataliabello@... wrote:

> Hi,
> I am new using Junit and in this mailing list.
> I have a question about setUp(); here it is:
> If i overrride the setUp() and tearDown() methods in my TestCase 
> class, all the test methods, will execute them? 

Yes.

> Are there any way to diferentiate between the tests that should 
> execute the setup and terdown and the ones that shouldnt execute them?

Not that I know of.

I use the setUp() method only for creating fixtures which will be used
in all tests.  Sometimes if I have onlly one or two tests which don't
need it, they'll just ignore what setUp() did and recreate their own.
I have one test suite where every test creates its own fixture 
because every one needs a different fixture.  That suite has an
empty setUp(), but its tearDown still handles erasing the fixture and
doing any required cleanup since that doesn't change much.
